status.text: Premiering Tomorrow, Tuesday the 8th. 9amPST/12pmEST/5pmGMT. GAGAKLEIN: ALEJANDRO. X Mother Monster.
Prejudice is a disease. And when they come for you, or refuse your worth, I will be ready for their stones. I belong to you. GAGAKLEIN
So many will try to destroy me. So many, over and over, coming in periods of greatness. But in this period, I cannot be broken: GAGAKLEIN.
I have dreamt a lifetime to get on this flight to NewYork. I don't care if its summer. Leather, high heels, and a bad attitude. Here I come.
Hair-Bleach party. Red nails, Red lipstick, and familiar burning hair fumes. Were swooning over the 2millviews of Alejandro preview. Paws up
Natalie Wilson from Blackpool, I just read your letter. U are wonderful + strong, believe in yourself. You can overcome anything! Mother M x
#ripanalilmonster 2nite's Monsterball we will dedicate wholly to you, your spirit, + your life. We will scream your name, dance, and rejoice
http://www.twitlonger.com/show/1l8ndr will cry all day, we lost a lovely and beautiful little monster ana to leukemia #ripanalittlemonster
http://www.twitlonger.com/show/1l8ndr I'm so deepy sad today reading this @JoelxSoul #ripanalilmonster. Monsters lets send her family love.
All is well at MEN ARENA,feel free to wear your coke cans proud in hair. Security has been reprimanded for censoring little monster freedoms
Outraged. RT @Laurapalooza: Staff at the MEN aren't letting people into the arena with cans in their hair. So many sad Little Monsters :(
ALEJANDRO: http://www.vevo.com/watch/lady-gaga/alejandro-teaser/USUV71001163 ALEJAND-EROO:http://bit.ly/ccrYKR
So apparently the WIN: ALEJANDRO AS SUMMMER SONG 2010 was due to my rabid and luminous fans,notMTV, although they held the wonderful contest
ATTENTION LITTLE MONSTERS:ALEJANDRO PREVIEWS BEGIN 2NITE STARTING 9PM ET/6PM PT ON CNN LARRY KING,THEN 9:30 EXCLUSIVE ON PEREZ, 9:35 VEVO X
MTV voted ALEJANDRO Song of the Summer little monsters! http://bit.ly/9YmiuR VideoPreview2nite!
In UK my Larry King interview airs 2am tonight and then 10am tomorrow on CNN previous tweet is US Tv schedule. Paws Up: Alejandro Preview.
Tonight, on Larry King 6pm pt/9pm et, I will be interviewed by the King, + preview my newest collaboration with Steven Klein: ALEJANDRO.
Just heard ALEJANDRO on the radio in LONDON, what a marvelous day. Showstudio, the O2 Arena, a peaceful lone car ride to hotel. Supreme.
In exactly one hour and 36 min u can watch me being interviewed live @ http://live.showstudio.com answering all your questions lil monsters!
At 12pm London time I will doing a LIVE interview with the amazing Nick Knight on www.showstudio.com tune in to see me answer your questions
little monsters are the sweetest, thank you lil babies http://twitpic.com/1rw7nj
In a Pub in England, ruining bar napkins with lyrics and memories. Dreams are never weak like we are, drunk or sober.
GLEE WAS SO AMAZING! AH!!!!
how often do you see this backstage at a popshow? paws up http://twitpic.com/1qqbne
Love is like a brick. You can build a house, or you can sink a dead body.
We won 5 WORLD MUSIC AWARDS little monsters!!+we took home BEST WORLD ALBUM! Thank you for believing in my music, you are so precious to me.
I am, perhaps a complicated person.+love seems to me,a complicated thing. But when I look at u, littlemonsters, its so simple. Love is easy.
On May 30 I will be interviewed LIVE by the amazing Nick Knight on Showstudio. Go to http://live.showstudio.com to submit questions for me!
i've never been happier http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2ergGCUHZ0 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PcIEEdTiNak&feature=player_embedded
At Carnegie Hall getting ready to sing + play piano w/ Sting, Elton, + The Boss. Warming up my fingers + my voice...for the rainforest
Taking a break today, in bed with mommy having glass of wine waiting for sis to get home. Just us italian girls running the house tonight
@McGlynny
@AliJ_johnson I used to feel just like you do. Believe in ureself no matter what, U will never know how powerful u are until u love yourself
@AliJ_johnson
Kleine Monsters. Berlin is about to explode as the Monsterball begins. Open the cathedral + bang on your drums, tonight is for your freedom.
http://vimeo.com/11592335 I am so blessed to have you little monsters + gagadaily. These videos you send and make for me mean the world. :*(
#AlejandroIsUrDaddy is TRENDING? Little Monsters are crazy?! (me and redone laughing on floor of studio) U are so funny! Thank u we love u!
Thank you for all my mother's day wishes little monsters! You make me so happy, I am so blessed and grateful to have u in my life. I love u!
So proud of idol, and haus of gaga, editing alejandro, music in sweden, ciggys and champagne keep out the worries + the rain. Xmothermonster
http://bit.ly/apyBrH FOX POORLY + AMATEURLY edited+cut my performance/musical arrangement on idol. Watch real version. http://bit.ly/apyBrH
http://bit.ly/apyBrH here's my full american idol performance ALEJANDRO. Fox chopped up my performance in 4 places. Real version on itunes.
htp://chainsawedit.com/qt/935A_Lady_Gaga_Perf.mov Idol cut down my performance--see the full-length performance here little monsters!
http://chainsawedit.com/qt/935A_Lady_Gaga_Perf.mov
I'm performing ALEJANDRO tonight on #AmericanIdol! Tune in little monsters, Paws up! I dedicate this performance to u, u make me strong. X
life is a red carpet
lady gaga + steven klein= une Pièce de résistance. Alejandro.
Fight and push harder for what you believe in, you'd be surprised, you are much stronger than you think. #Alejandro. American Idol.
@boomkack sometimes it only takes one person who really believes in you. Love my mommy laurie X
#monsterrevenge too?? You're on fire today! I'm really gonna kick some ass in rehearsal now, got u in my heart through every move + breath
IS #Alejandro TRENDING???!! GOOO LITTLE MONSTERS!!!!!!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YrnTY9_KMQg FAVORITE BAND "We Are The World" saw them live sick, video amazing
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wQAMYRC4_8U So many tears, u make me whole little monsters. Without u, I would have no voice. Thank you :*(
Rehearsal till we bleed. Sweat, passion, + knee pads. Feel like I've waited an eternity to release my favorite song from The Fame Monster.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=155hzp_QeS4 the rehearsal take that no one saw on tv bad girls
A day at work in Tokyo, Japan with my new associates. Showing Polaroid my new vision and designs as creative direc http://twitpic.com/1h0tba
Were not on Rivington St. anymore Toto. Me, Justin, and Posh! in Japan, of course we found the only bar in Osaka t http://twitpic.com/1ggwtt
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dgNg9QdsNg0&feature=player_embedded See you on American Idol. MAY 5th, Little Monsters.
http://twitpic.com/1fqcty
http://twitpic.com/1fezn9
THIS KILLS ME, I love my fans http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5DTsRAnP-E8
I need to harness my wine etiquette this tablecloth looks like valley forge
So like a pop conquistador, i imagine my future return, with many wenches and music. So until then i wish you all the love in the universe.
as i was singing bad romance last night, and the energy and fever of the monsters became, at once, a great storm--an aussie flag appeared
im not your babe @fernandogaribay
I love you cole, you just be yourself. You're perfect the way God made you. #colethegreat @fiercefaggot
Been in the studio for days and hours of record after record, and when I hear that a little monster was discriminated against* BY TEACHERS
Thank u for wearing your tee-shirt proud at school, you make me so proud, at the monsterball, you are an inspiration to us all. I love you.X
It reminds me of my commitment + love for u, and the deep unconditional devotion I feel to write music that will liberate you from prejudice
Just saw three little monsters walk out of a chapel across the street from arena. Pre-monsterball confession or Easter? AMAZING. SO TWISTED.
Alejandro is on the radio, fuck it sounds so good we did it little monsters
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJbQUTYafdM&feature=player_embedded Ah, the good old days. Who says you can't make a music video for a BBQ
Love, Mother Monster X
@perezhilton i wish i had been there, you are a wonderful friend, only you would party all night/free cuba in the morning
Its really me @gagadaily xoxo
Thank you so much, from my soul, @gagadaily and the world. Be yourself, and never let anyone stop you from loving who you are. Im speechless
@gagadaily i dont know what I did to deserve the gift of you and all my fans. But God made you little monsters very special. U are my heart
http://bit.ly/9fZ67S i've never cried so hard in 24 years, from pure joy and unconditional love. Tears still streaming
I'm 24 today, so u know what that means? Let's raise a glass to 30 more years of writing music and videos for my beautiful little monsters.X
Thank you so much for all the beautiful birthday messages, videos, and gifts. The greatest present I've been given this year is you I love u
http://twitpic.com/1aqjhx - Nothing like a communist-red teacup to make for the perfect Birthday gift. Last words are for fools who haven't
Writing music, leopard tights,monster varsity jacket I'm grateful to have fans that continue to inspire me Ready to sweat tonight melbourne
@perezhilton happy birthday my darling friend. may your party be blessed with innappropriate shennanigans, caviar, and heavy gifts. Lovewife
What mayhem in Melbourne tonight. Some kids just understand what it means live your eyeliner, breathe your lipstick, and kill for eachother.
TELEPHONE WENT #1 IN THE UK! + THE ALBUM FAME MONSTER WENT #1 UK! WE DID IT HONEY B! LOVE + KISSES TO OUR FANS, WE COULDNT DO IT WITHOUT U.
http://twitpic.com/19z2px - RUSSIAN ROSE GOLD VAMPIRE GRILLZ early birthday present from the haus, gravediggaz! i've been begging for these
We sold out three madison square gardens in 1 hour little monsters! I was just a girl after her teenage dream, thank u for standing by me.

Telephone made history today little monsters! Thank you for all your support of the video, you are the future, you are the kings and queens
I swear tonight didn't feel like an arena. It felt like 15,000 sweaty KIDS in a club in 1985. Kiwi bitchen. Sydney, are u ready?
